articles.title: US inflation rises at slowest pace in two years - BBC
articles.description: Inflation rose by 3% in the year to June but US interest rates are expected to rise again.
articles.content:
The rate of price growth in the US dropped to its slowest pace in more than two years last month, helped by cheaper used cars. 
Inflation rose 3% in the year to June, according to data, from 4% in M… [+3362 chars]
